      • getOrder

        public static Order getOrder(java.lang.String line)
                      throws ErrorTypeOne
        a function that calls for a creation of an order object given a line fron the commendfile for build instruction. the function split the line (string)
        Parameters:
        line - string - an agreed format for instructions
        Returns:
        AN ORDER OBJECT of some type
        Throws:
        ErrorTypeOne - Exception dealing with bad line commend format from the commendfile

      • isOrderIsValid

        private static Order isOrderIsValid(java.lang.String[] commendOfOrder)
                             throws ErrorTypeOne
        THIS FUNCTION checks is the line read from the commend, now an array of strings file is valid, if is it will create an order object according to instroction in line
        Parameters:
        commendOfOrder - an array of strings ,each cell in array has info. about type, and action of this order
        Returns:
        an order object
        Throws:
        ErrorTypeOne - Exception dealing with bad line commend format from the commendfile
